main event: A bus driver reported observing thirteen inverted saucer-shaped objects traveling in a straight line at 300 mph near Des Moines, Iowa on June 29, 1947.
interesting points: The objects were described as dirty white and elliptical in form,The objects made a sound similar to an electric motor,The sighting involved 13 objects flying in a single file formation,The altitude of the objects was estimated to be 1000 feet,There were additional reports of similar sightings in Iowa around the same time.
